featured.text: As blood supplies have fallen to a critically low level, many hospitals are making an ______ for the public to donate blood.

definition.zh_def: 捐贈，將財物或資源無償地提供給需要的人或機構。
definition.en_def: To give money or goods to a charity or other organization for a good cause.
definition.example: She decided to donate her old clothes to the local shelter.
